Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: twiggy

Arguments.Name: diff
Arguments.Description: Diff the old and new versions of a binary to see what sizes changed

Arguments.Name: dominators
Arguments.Description: Compute and display the dominator tree for a binary's call graph

Arguments.Name: garbage
Arguments.Description: Find and display code and data that is not transitively referenced by any exports or public functions

Arguments.Name: help
Arguments.Description: Prints this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

Arguments.Name: monos
Arguments.Description: List the generic function monomorphizations that are contributing to code bloat

Arguments.Name: paths
Arguments.Description: Find and display the call paths to a function in the given binary's call graph

Arguments.Name: top
Arguments.Description: List the top code size offenders in a binary
